H0.text: Which modern-day country staged the sailing events for the 1980 Moscow Olympics. Finland

H1.text: Which modern-day country staged the sailing events for the 1980 Moscow Olympics. Poland

H2.text: Which modern-day country staged the sailing events for the 1980 Moscow Olympics. Sweden

H3.text: Which modern-day country staged the sailing events for the 1980 Moscow Olympics. Estija

A4.text: The sailing event was held in Tallinn, Soviet-occupied Estonia.
